channel.title: Aggra on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in Aggra on From Draenor With Love

item.title: Not a Chance, Thrall
item.description: Seriously dude, we all know why this is a bad idea. Speaking of orc babies, Vid brought up an interesting question while doing the art – what color skin would the baby of a green-skinned orc and a brown-skinned orc have? We settled on sort of an olive complexion, but only time will tell! As for Thrall and Aggra’s kid? It’d be nice if it were a girl orc, who goes on to accomplish great things.
